resources.string:
Hello, my name is Angus. 

I am a Data Scientist.

I am learning to make apps, so I can develop an app that notifies you with location based facts and trivia. 
I want the facts to be crowd sourced, allowing users to add their own facts about their hometown, and upvote/downvote other facts. 
Users can try to "collect" as many facts as possible! 

If I ever actually get around to developing it, I'll update this bio! 

FillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFillerFiller
